Initializer# init(truncating:)

iOS 8.0+iPadOS 8.0+Mac Catalyst 8.0+macOS 10.10+tvOS 9.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 2.0+

```
init(truncating number: NSNumber)
```

### [Converting Floating-Point Values](/documentation/swift/double/init(truncating:)#Converting-Floating-Point-Values)

[`init<Source>(Source)`](/documentation/swift/double/init(_:)-1488d)Creates a new instance from the given value, rounded to the closest possible representation.[`init(Double)`](/documentation/swift/double/init(_:)-o1k9)Creates a new instance initialized to the given value.[`init(Float)`](/documentation/swift/double/init(_:)-5h7qh)Creates a new instance that approximates the given value.[`init(Float16)`](/documentation/swift/double/init(_:)-aeox)Creates a new instance that approximates the given value.[`init(Float80)`](/documentation/swift/double/init(_:)-9z7ob)Creates a new instance that approximates the given value.[`init(CGFloat)`](/documentation/swift/double/init(_:)-7ag2w)[`init(sign: FloatingPointSign, exponent: Int, significand: Double)`](/documentation/swift/double/init(sign:exponent:significand:))Creates a new value from the given sign, exponent, and significand.[`init(signOf: Double, magnitudeOf: Double)`](/documentation/swift/double/init(signof:magnitudeof:))Creates a new floating-point value using the sign of one value and the magnitude of another.[`init<Source>(Source)`](/documentation/swift/double/init(_:)-1oh9r)Creates a new value, rounded to the closest possible representation.
